snippet: With efforts in the United Nations failing, the Syrian government pressed on with its crackdown as some opposition leaders said force was their only option.
abstract: Collapse of the United Nations Security Council's diplomatic efforts to mediate Syria's uprising reverberates across the country, emboldening Pres Bashar al-Assad's government, which presses on with its crackdown; rebel leaders are prompted by the violence to vow that Assad will only be driven from power through the use of force.
lead_paragraph: With efforts in the United Nations failing, the Syrian government pressed on with its crackdown as some opposition leaders said force was their only option.

headline.seo: Syria Steps Up Crackdown After Failed U.N. Motion
headline.main: Syrian Unrest After a Failure of Diplomacy
headline.print_headline: Syrian Unrest After a Failure Of Diplomacy

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
